template.name: Initializer
Motor
Station
template.parameter: const StationId station_id, const SlotId slot_id, const int elaboration_time, const SlotId in_sensor_slot, const OutSensorId out_sensor_id, const double stdDeviation

template.name: InSensor
template.parameter: const InSensorId id, const StationId station_controlled, const int probWeight_1, const int probWeight_2

template.name: OutSensor
template.parameter: const OutSensorId id, const SlotId position, const int probWeight_1, const int probWeight_2

template.name: ConveyorBelt
FlowController_0
template.parameter: const int[0, 109] pos_out_sensor_2, const int[0, 109] pos_out_sensor_3

query.formula: Pr[<=10000] ([] initializer.run_state imply (sum(i : SlotId) slot_busy[i]) == DISKS)
query.comment:
No spawn or disappear of disk
Verifies properties: P1. it never happens that a station holds more than 1 piece; P2. it never happens that two pieces occupy the same belt slot.

query.formula: Pr[<=10000] (<> (forall(id : OutSensorId) outSensor(id).Locked imply check_queue(id, POS_OUT_SENSORS[id])))
query.comment:
If the sensor is locked, at least one position between it's input sensor and the location right before it is free
Verifies property: P3. No queue ever exceeds the maximum allowed length.
--- NOT SIGNIFICANT ---

Verifies property: P4. the plant never incurs in deadlock.
The idea is to mark as true this wrong behavior.

query.formula: Pr[<=100] ([] initializer.run_state imply ((sum(p : int[14, 17]) slot_busy[p] == true) <= 1) )

simulate[<=1000] { station(0).Pre_processing + station(0).Processing * 2 + station(0).Done * 3 + 4*5, station(1).Pre_processing + station(1).Processing * 2 + station(1).Done * 3 + 4*4, station(2).Pre_processing + station(2).Processing * 2 + station(2).Done * 3 + 4*3, station(3).Pre_processing + station(3).Processing * 2 + station(3).Done * 3 + 4*2, station(4).Pre_processing + station(4).Processing * 2 + station(4).Done * 3 + 4, station(5).Pre_processing + station(5).Processing * 2 + station(5).Done * 3 }
simulate[<=1000] { outSensor(0).Locked + 4*4, outSensor(1).Locked + 4*3, outSensor(2).Locked + 4*2, outSensor(3).Locked + 4, outSensor(4).Locked }
simulate[<=1000] { inSensor(0).Locked + 4*5, inSensor(1).Locked + 4*4, inSensor(2).Locked + 4*3, inSensor(3).Locked + 4*2, inSensor(4).Locked + 4, inSensor(5).Locked }

simulate[<=1000] { slot_busy[12], slot_busy[13] + 2, slot_busy[14] + 4, slot_busy[15] + 6, slot_busy[16] + 8, slot_busy[17] + 10, slot_busy[18] + 12, station(0).Processing + station(0).Done + 14, in_sensors_state[0] + 16 }
